title: By the King, a proclamation for the putting in execution the laws and statutes of this realm, for the preventing the exportation of sheep, wooll, wooll-fells, woollen-yarn, mortlings, shorlings, wooll-stocks, fullers-earth, and fulling-clay out of this kingdom
author: England and Wales. Sovereign (1685-1688 : James II)
publisher: Printed by Charles Bill, Henry Hills, and Thomas Newcomb ...,
